305-35.png: terms you can; and I shall fulfil any contract
305-36.png: you may enter into. What I have engaged here
306-03.png: has been at 2s/. per bushel. You may procure
306-04.png: six or eight hundred bushel at that rate,
306-05.png: and see that they are forwarded to Winches-
306-06.png: ter as expeditiously as possible: in order to do
306-07.png: this, you must hire and impress waggons:
306-08.png: those Horses which were sent round from
306-09.png: Williamsburgh, are also to go up; and a mili-
306-10.png: tary Chest which Mr. Allen made for me, is
306-11.png: to receive the first conveyance You are to
306-13.png: seeing these things done, until further Orders.
306-14.png: All the Recruits which now are, and shall
306-15.png: arrive at Fredericksburgh, between this and
306-18.png: N:B. Enquire of Mr. Dick and other Mer-
306-19.png: chants, whether Commissary Walker has en-
306-20.png: gaged Salt of them: if he has, you have
306-21.png: then only to forward it up.
306-26.png: You are hereby required to take
306-27.png: charge of the Recruits sent to Winchester by
306-28.png: Captain Gist, whose Son you must Order
306-29.png: to proceed immediately and join his Father.
306-31.png: one hundred pounds to recruit with; and
306-32.png: the same Orders that were given to the o-
306-33.png: ther officers on the 3rd. instant Vc.
307-05.png: A Sergeant and twelve men, to be
307-06.png: in readiness to escort a waggon up to Winchester to-
307-09.png: 11th. To Sergeant Campbell, of the Virginia Regiment.
307-10.png: You are to be particularly careful of the
307-11.png: Waggons Vc. under your charge, and are to see that centi-
307-12.png: nels are kept over them. If any just complaint is made
307-13.png: of the misbehaviour of the party under your command,
307-14.png: upon their march, you will be punished by a Court Mar-
307-15.png: tial -. You are to see that the waggoners do not loiter
307-16.png: or idle their time; but make the utmost dispatch to
307-17.png: Winchester. So soon as you arrive at Winchester, you
307-18.png: are to deliver the things to the Commissary there, and
307-19.png: are to take his receipt for them.
307-25.png: You are ordered to remain here with
307-26.png: your Recruits until further orders. So soon as you ar-
307-27.png: rive here, your men will be supplied with Clothes by
307-28.png: applying to Major Carlyle. If any of your men
307-29.png: should desert, you are to use your utmost dili-
307-30.png: gence in pursuing and apprehending them, by im-
307-31.png: mediately advertising, and sending a party or
307-35.png: 16th. To Ensign Buckner. Quarter Master to the Virginia
307-36.png: Regiment. - The Recruits now in this town are to re-
